table.name: i_log_detail
table.description: This table is related to the I_LOG table for storing the details of the audit trail information for the XML transmissions and transactions. The I_LOG_DETAIL table stores qualifier/value pairs associated with a given log message.

columns.name: I_LOG_DETAIL_SEQNO
columns.description: I_LOG_DETAIL_SEQNO provides a sequence number for a transaction.

columns.name: I_LOG_SEQNO
columns.description: A pointer back to the log sequence number from I_Log table.

columns.name: I_LOG_DETAIL_QUAL
columns.description: I_LOG_DETAIL_QUAL provides the application name, transaction code and transaction number for an XML transaction.

columns.name: I_LOG_DETAIL_VALUE
columns.description: The actual value for log detail.

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: Populated through a trigger, this key is used to determine into which partition this record should be inserted.  The formula is based upon the insert_date column and the frequency in which this table is associated (weekly, monthly, quarterly).  Valid values are 1-4.
